entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
